T02D2328:269a-1: badzra b'a r'a h'a s'i dha nam /
T02D2328:269a-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2328:269a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2328:269a-5: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni //
T02D2328:269a-6: 'khor lo'i gtso la rab btud nas //
T02D2328:269a-7: de yi zab mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2328:269a-8: dra ba sdom pa'i tshul bzhin bshad //
T02D2328:269a-9: de la rdo rje phag mo sgrub par 'dod pas
T02D2328:269a-10: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su stan bde ba
T02D2328:269a-11: la 'dug la / kha nub tu bltas te dang
T02D2328:269a-12: por sems bskyed pa sngon du song bas dad pas
T02D2328:269a-13: gzhi bzung bsod nams kyis tshogs bsag go //
T02D2328:269a-14: de nas rim gyis snang ba 'byung ba la bla ma spyi bor bsgoms la /
T02D2328:269a-15: yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2328:269a-22: ces pas lag pa byin gyis brlabs la go bgo
T02D2328:269a-23: ste bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sngags 'di
T02D2328:269a-24: brjod do // aom hrim gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'am phat sr'a h'a /
T02D2328:269a-25: de nas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub 'byung
T02D2328:269a-26: bas lus ngag yid gsum gyis thabs la mkhas par
T02D2328:269a-27: bya ste / aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a
T02D2328:269a-28: wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod pas lus rnam par dag
T02D2328:269a-29: pa lha'i gzhal yas khang chos 'byung gi dkyil du
T02D2328:269a-30: bya ste / bsam / aom badzra shuddha:sarba dharm'a badzra
T02D2328:269a-31: shuddho& ham zhes brjod pas ngag rnam par dag pa
T02D2328:269a-32: sngags kyi 'khor lo la aom aom aom sarba buddha
T02D2328:269a-35: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye /
T02D2328:269a-36: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2328:269a-38: aom yo ga shuddha:sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham zhes
T02D2328:269a-39: brjod yid rnam par dag pa lha'i sku zhal gcig
T02D2328:269a-40: phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thod pa dang kha
T02D2328:269a-42: sku mdog dmar ba la dur khrod chas kyis brgyan pa zhabs g-yas bskum pa /
T02D2328:269b-0: g-yon brkyang bas dus mtshan @269b ma mnan pa //
T02D2328:269b-1: gar dgu'i nyams kyis bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2328:269b-2: de'i gsang gnas su chu'i sa bon las 'od 'phros
T02D2328:269b-3: pas phyag rgya bzhis ye shes kyi lha mo dgug
T02D2328:269b-5: de yang rang nyid lta bu gcig spyan drangs la phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul /
T02D2328:269b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul /
T02D2328:269b-13: bdag la mkha' 'gro ma bzhis bstod //
T02D2328:269b-15: aom badzra yo gi n'i k'a ma ru pa yo gi n'i /
T02D2328:269b-16: dzva la mu khi ni kha kha kh'a hi kh'a
T02D2328:269b-17: hi h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod cing rkang pa
T02D2328:269b-18: brgyad kyis bstod / de nas thabs bla na med
T02D2328:269b-19: pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pas yod med gnyis
T02D2328:269b-20: su med pa'i gdams ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes
T02D2328:269b-21: brgyad kyis bstod / par bya'o // mar gyur thugs kyi dpal be'u las //
T02D2328:269b-22: zab mo bcud kyi thigs pa byung //
T02D2328:269b-23: skal ldan rin chen lta bu yi //
T02D2328:269b-24: rdo rje phag mo 'grub par shog / rdo rje
T02D2328:269b-25: phag mo'i sgrub thabs rje btsun ka ma la sh'i
